attributes.action: utilise the nation's huge reserves of wave power (due to our status as an island) to cleanly deliver power to everyone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live on an island - the ideal opportunity to use modern technology to deliver clean energy to our homes and businesses without having to use fossil fuels, nuclear power or even unreliable solar and wind energy.  Let's invest in waves and lead the world in clean electricity - you have to work with your strengths, not your weaknesses!
